body:
Comment 5 by **jasaugusto**: 
Many Thankx Alex,

I just installed the Go 1.1 386 zip installer in another box (also a 10 yr old
Windows 2000 installation :-) but with a Intel processor (I think its
a 2.4 GHz Pentium 4, the first to be launched with 1 processor and 2 threads) and the
error doesn't appear. 'Go version' works OK.

Meanwhile I started to compile Go1.1 from the sources in mingw,
but there were errors. I'll try to figure out what is happening ASAP. 
(I have two work seats, plus home, and commute :-)

I will not quit, I think Go is the way to go ;-)

Kind Regards,

Jos√©
